title: The Family Remains
description: The Family Upstairs has gripped audiences around the world, becoming a smash hit with readers everywhere. In 2022 #1 bestselling author Lisa Jewell will publish a sequel.**Pre-order now to be one of the first to read it.**'Enthralling' RUTH WARE'Gripping' OLIVIA COLMAN'Engrossing' IAN RANKIN'Twisty' CLARE MACKINTOSH'Excellent' GUARDIAN'Stupendous' RUTH JONES'Brilliant' SARAH PINBOROUGH'Unputdownable' C.L. TAYLOR
author: Lisa Jewell
